tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE digital_assets (
    asset_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    asset_size INT NOT NULL,
    blockchain_transaction_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE music_assets (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    blockchain_transaction_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE artwork_assets (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    medium VARCHAR(50),
    blockchain_transaction_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE DigitalAssets (
    asset_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    asset_description TEXT,
    owner_id INT NOT NULL,
    blockchain_transaction_id VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE AssetOwners (
    owner_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    owner_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    owner_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    owner_public_key TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE BlockchainTransactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    block_number INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    confirmation_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE music_files (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    artist_name VARCHAR(100),
    duration INT,
    upload_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE artwork (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(100),
    medium VARCHAR(50),
    size VARCHAR(50),
    creation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id VARCHAR(255),
    asset_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    proof_of_ownership BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE asset_ownership (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT,
    owner_name VARCHAR(100),
    owner_email VARCHAR(100),
    owner_address VARCHAR(255),
    ownership_start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE digital_assets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    upload_date TIMESTAMP,
    blockchain_tx_id VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    tx_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_owner_id INT,
    to_owner_id INT,
    asset_id INT,
    tx_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (from_owner_id) REFERENCES asset_owners(owner_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (to_owner_id) REFERENCES asset_owners(owner_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES digital_assets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE royalties (
    royalty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    royalty_amount DECIMAL,
    recipient_owner_id INT,
    asset_id INT,
    tx_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (recipient_owner_id) REFERENCES asset_owners(owner_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES digital_assets(asset_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tx_id) REFERENCES transactions(tx_id)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain (
    block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_hash VARCHAR(255),
    previous_block_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    tx_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (previous_block_id) REFERENCES blockchain(block_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tx_id) REFERENCES transactions(tx_id)
);
